ðŸ“– Summary: CoinVert is a currency converter that supports over 200 currencies, including cryptocurrencies, providing real-time exchange rate updates. It emphasizes user privacy by avoiding ads, tracking, and data collection, while also offering offline functionality with cached rates. The application aims to provide a modern and intuitive user interface for seamless currency conversions.
